= Details =

When you install it under a sub-folder and you want to use .htaccess, verify that you specified the _RewriteBase_


  * Make writable the folders *./images* and *./cache* 
  * You have to insert in the database the application.sql
  * Change your database configuration in database.php
  * Change your configuration in config.php
  * Go to yoursite.com/login the first username and password will become administrator
